concept.title: Notes
concept.shortdesc: Notes can be acced to your library just as other items in your library.

conbody.p: In addition to items and file attachments, you can also store notes in your Zotero library: child notes, which belong to a specific item, and standalone notes. Notes are synced along with item metadata; they don't count against your Zotero file storage quota. Notes are searchable and support HTML formatting.

section.title: Child Note
section.p: Child notes are notes that belongs to a specific item.

section.title: Standalone Note
section.p: Standalone notes are notes that are note directly related to any item. Standalone notes will appear alongside any other items in your library.
